properties.name: Name
properties.help: The name of the cluster.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: Location
properties.help: Location. You can configure the default location using `az configure --defaults location=&lt;location&gt;`.

properties.name: NoWait
properties.help: Do not wait for the long-running operation to finish.

properties.name: Tags
properties.help: Space-separated tags in 'key[=value]' format. Use "" to clear existing tags.

properties.name: ClusterConfigurations
properties.help: Extra configurations of various components, in JSON.

properties.name: ClusterTier
properties.help: The tier of the cluster: standard or premium.

properties.name: ComponentVersion
properties.help: The versions of various Hadoop components, in space-separated versions in 'component=version' format. Example: Spark=2.0 Hadoop=2.7.3 See also: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/hdinsight/hdinsight-component-versioning#hadoop-components-available-with-different-hdinsight-versions.

properties.name: Size
properties.help: The number of worker nodes in the cluster.

properties.name: Type
properties.help: Type of HDInsight cluster, like: hadoop, interactivehive, hbase, kafka, storm, spark, rserver, mlservices. See also: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/hdinsight/hdinsight-hadoop-provision-linux-clusters#cluster-types.

properties.name: Version
properties.help: The HDInsight cluster version. See also: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/hdinsight/hdinsight-component-versioning#supported-hdinsight-versions.

properties.name: HttpPassword
properties.help: HTTP password for the cluster.

properties.name: HttpUser
properties.help: HTTP username for the cluster.  Default: admin.

properties.name: SubnetName
properties.help: The name of the subnet in the specified virtual network.

properties.name: VirtualNetwork
properties.help: The virtual network resource ID of an existing virtual network.

properties.name: EdgenodeSize
properties.help: The size of the node. See also: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/hdinsight/hdinsight-hadoop-provision-linux-clusters#configure-cluster-size.

properties.name: HeadnodeSize
properties.help: The size of the node. See also: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/hdinsight/hdinsight-hadoop-provision-linux-clusters#configure-cluster-size.

properties.name: WorkernodeDataDiskSize
properties.help: The size of the data disk in GB, e.g. 1023.

properties.name: WorkernodeDataDiskStorageAccountType
properties.help: The type of storage account that will be used for the data disks: standard_lrs or premium_lrs.

properties.name: WorkernodeDataDisksPerNode
properties.help: The number of data disks to use per worker node.

properties.name: WorkernodeSize
properties.help: The size of the node. See also: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/hdinsight/hdinsight-hadoop-provision-linux-clusters#configure-cluster-size.

properties.name: ZookeepernodeSize
properties.help: The size of the node. See also: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/hdinsight/hdinsight-hadoop-provision-linux-clusters#configure-cluster-size.

properties.name: SshPassword
properties.help: SSH password for the cluster nodes. If none specified, uses the HTTP password.

properties.name: SshPublicKey
properties.help: SSH public key for the cluster nodes.

properties.name: SshUser
properties.help: SSH username for the cluster nodes.

properties.name: StorageAccount
properties.help: The storage account, e.g. "<name>.blob.core.windows.net".

properties.name: StorageAccountKey
properties.help: The storage account key. A key can be retrieved automatically if the user has access to the storage account.

properties.name: StorageDefaultContainer
properties.help: The storage container the cluster will use. Uses the cluster name if none was specified. (WASB only).

properties.name: StorageDefaultFilesystem
properties.help: The storage filesystem the cluster will use. (DFS only).

properties.name: Name
properties.help: The name of the cluster.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: NoWait
properties.help: Do not wait for the long-running operation to finish.

properties.name: Yes
properties.help: Do not prompt for confirmation.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: The name of the cluster.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: NoWait
properties.help: Do not wait for the long-running operation to finish.

properties.name: TargetInstanceCount
properties.help: The target instance count for the operation.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: The name of the cluster.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: The name of the cluster.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: Created
properties.help: Wait until created with 'provisioningState' at 'Succeeded'.

properties.name: Custom
properties.help: Wait until the condition satisfies a custom JMESPath query. E.g. provisioningState!='InProgress', instanceView.statuses[?code=='PowerState/running'].

properties.name: Deleted
properties.help: Wait until deleted.

properties.name: Exists
properties.help: Wait until the resource exists.

properties.name: Interval
properties.help: Polling interval in seconds.

properties.name: Timeout
properties.help: Maximum wait in seconds.

properties.name: Updated
properties.help: Wait until updated with provisioningState at 'Succeeded'.

commonTaskProperties.name: Debug
commonTaskProperties.help: Increase logging verbosity to show all debug logs.

commonTaskProperties.name: Help
commonTaskProperties.help: Show this help message and exit.

commonTaskProperties.name: Query
commonTaskProperties.help: JMESPath query string. See http://jmespath.org/ for more information and examples.

commonTaskProperties.name: Verbose
commonTaskProperties.help: Increase logging verbosity. Use --debug for full debug logs.
